snippet: A suicide bomber detonated a tricycle taxi packed with explosives on Tuesday night at an outdoor World Cup viewing center in a northeast Nigerian city, Damaturu, the capital of Yobe State.
abstract: Suicide bomber detonates a tricycle taxi packed with explosives at outdoor World Cup viewing center in Damaturu, Nigeria, killing several people and critically wounding 15 others.
lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber detonated a tricycle taxi packed with explosives on Tuesday night at an outdoor World Cup viewing center in a northeast Nigerian city, Damaturu, the capital of Yobe State.
